mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( member_id, member_email, member_pass, member_name, member_phone, member_address, member_gender, member_birth, member_role, member_status ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPass}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirth}, COALESCE(#{memberRole}, 'USER'), COALESCE(#{memberStatus}, 'ACTIVE') )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_email, member_pass, member_name, member_phone, member_address, member_gender, member_birth, member_role, member_status, created_at, updated_at FROM MEMBER WHERE member_email = #{memberEmail} AND member_status = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT member_id, member_email, member_pass, member_name, member_phone, member_address, member_gender, member_birth, member_role, member_status, created_at, updated_at FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET member_email = #{memberEmail}, member_name = #{memberName}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_address = #{memberAddress}, member_gender = #{memberGender}, member_birth = #{memberBirth} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_status = 'ACTIVE'
